Label: GDPR Rights Impact
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on one or more rights defined by GDPR

Label: Impact on A13 Right to be Informed
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A13 Right to be Informed

Label: Impact on A14 Right to be Informed
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A14 Right to be Informed

Label: Impact on A15 Right of Access
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A15 Right of Access

Label: Impact on A16 Right to Rectification
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A16 Right to Rectification

Label: Impact on A17 Right to Erasure
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A17 Right to Erasure

Label: Impact on A18 Right to Restrict Processing
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A18 Right to Restrict Processing

Label: Impact on A19 Right to Rectification Notification
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A19 Right to Rectification Notification

Label: Impact on A20 Right to Data Portability
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A20 Right to Data Portability

Label: Impact on A21 Right to object
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A21 Right to object

Label: Impact on A22 Right to object to automated decision making
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A22 Right to object to automated decision making

Label: Impact on A7-3 Right to Withdraw Consent
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A7-3 Right to Withdraw Consent

Label: Impact on A77 Right to Complaint
Definition: Something that acts as or is considered as an impact on A77 Right to Complaint

Label: A13 Violated
Definition: A violation of A13 obligation regarding providing information
Usage: What constitutes as a violation of A13 depends on the particulars of the situation, therefore we suggest first representing the impact using the appropriate category of impact (e.g. denied, limited) and then assessing whether it constitutes as a violation

Label: A13 ExercisePrevented
Definition: The prevention of A13 obligation to provide information e.g. by preventing the data subject from obtaining this information

Label: A13 Limited
Definition: A limited fulfillment of A13 obligation to provide information e.g. not providing all required information

Label: A13 Denied
Definition: A denial that A13 applied to the situation

Label: A13 Unfulfilled
Definition: Non-fulfillment of A13 obligation to provide required information

Label: A13 Obstructed
Definition: Obstruction of A13 obligation to provide information e.g. asking for unnecessary identity verification and making it difficult to obtain information

Label: A13 Eroded
Definition: Erosion of A13 obligation to provide information e.g. by repeatedly and systematically limited or denying it
